籤詩版本二:
Ngaphambili, ndaphulukana nenaliti kwiphenyane lam, kodwa ngoku ndisayikhangela elwandle.
Ukuba inaliti yokuqala ifunyenwe, kuya kuthatha ixesha elininzi kunye nomzamo.
詩意:
Le hexagram ifana nokukhangela inaliti elwandle.
Yonke into ifuna ukusebenza nzima.
解曰: Ithamsanqa sisiseko sethamsanqa. ULu yimbewu yentsikelelo. Cacisa ngokucacileyo. Kuyacetyiswa ukuba ulumke.
籤詩故事一:
◇UHuang Xiaozi wakhangela izalamane zakhe kangangeekhilomitha ezingamawaka
UHuang Juejing wayevela eJianchang. Xa wayeneminyaka emihlanu ubudala, wafelwa ngunina ngenxa yemfazwe. Emva kwexesha elithile, wafunga ezulwini ukuba uya kucengceleza izibhalo zamaBhuda ukuze afumane unina. Emva koko wawela umlambo iHuaihe waya kucela, wanyamezela umoya nemvula waza wanyamezela ubunzima.Emva kweminyaka engamashumi amabini anesibhozo, wafika eChundian, eLiang County, eRuzhou, apho ekugqibeleni wamfumana unina waza wabuya.
聖意: Indlu ayikuphathi kakuhle, qaphela ufune ubutyebi, wenze isivumelwano, ube nomtshato, uLiujia uvimba abahambi ngeenyawo, ugcina abantu emasimini, zilungile iintshulube zesilika. Kunzima ukumangala.Kufanelekile ukufuduka.Kufanelekile ukufudusa impahla elahlekileyo.Kunzima ukuchacha kwizifo ezimandundu.Ukuhlaliswa okwethutyana kumangcwaba asezintabeni.
古人: U-Huang Xiaozi wakhangela izalamane zakhe kangangeekhilomitha ezingamawaka
